content.raw:
This compiler error only seems to happen with protobuf3 which isn't available on `apt-get`, so it'll be a bit of a chore for me to recreate it on my machine.

It seems that `google/protobuf/stubs/casts.h` is not available in protobuf2. I guess we can wrap that `#include` directive, similarly to the `#if GOOGLE_PROTOBUF_VERSION > 2999999` where the issue occurs.

Incidentally, is there a reason we use `#if GOOGLE_PROTOBUF_VERSION >= 2999999` instead of `#if GOOGLE_PROTOBUF_VERSION >= 3000000`? I feel like the latter expresses its purpose a bit more clearly.
